message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.
I'll start with a 50/50 split. Your turn.
Thanks for the offer, Bob, but I'd like to try to get a bit more. 50/50 is a good starting point, but I'll try to do better.
I'll take a bigger share this time, Bob. 70% is a fair price for my skills, don't you think?
I'll take a slightly smaller share this time, but I still think I deserve more than 40%.
Alright, Bob, you've made a good offer. I'll accept 40% and you can have 60%. Let's call it a day!
